attributes.action: Let England vote to expel Scotland from the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: In the 2014 Scottish Referendum, English voters had no say in the potential breakup of the United Kingdom. Following the EU Referendum, the Scottish Government is considering a second referendum on independence from the UK. Should England (and the rest of the UK) have a say in any potential divorce?

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125451
